title: HOTEL-BOOKING APPLICATION
description: A full-stack hotel booking application built with MERN, Clerk, and Stripe, featuring secure authentication, seamless payments, and an admin dashboard for efficient property and reservation management.

title: REAL-TIME VIDEO CALLING AND SOCIAL CHAT APPLICATION
description: A real-time video calling and social chat application built with the MERN stack, Stream Video SDK, and JWT, featuring secure authentication, private messaging, dynamic theming, and optimized WebSocket APIs for low-latency performance.

title: FOOD-DELIVERY APPLICATION
description: A responsive food delivery application built with the MERN stack and Stripe, offering secure authentication, real-time order tracking, and an admin dashboard for restaurant and order management.
